website_summaries.verdict: One of the best parts of the Angry Birds movie was Red’s attempts at getting his own anger under control, and it’s just as much fun to rebuild it for yourself.
pros: Recreate the hilarious “Anger Management Class” scene from the movie
Includes Red, Biker Pig, and Matilda mini-figures

customer_reviews.title: Still - The Highest Quality Toys For Building
customer_reviews.text: LEGO makes high quality toys. They impress - and continue to last for generations. They are more expensive than when I was young, but what isn't? My grandson has several sets now - and even the more expensive ones are worth their cost. They exercise creativity, imagination and engineering skills - which is lacking in today's "Vidiot" world. I do recommend this - and all of the LEGO line-ups for those dear to you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves legos and angry birds, so for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves legos and angry birds, so for Christmas he is getting all the big sets. He has seen them many times in store and has commented on wanting them many times. My son is 6 and has put together 1500 piece sets by himself, so I'm sure these won't be to hard, though dad likes to help as much as he will let me ( just a big kid )
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This set was added to the Angry Birds layout at 8 year old grandson's layout. The Angry Birds sets make for hours of fun playtime.

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son for this 7th birthday. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for this 7th birthday. He's been an angry birds fanatic since he was 3 or 4. So when they came out with angry birds legos, the was over the moon. He put it together and it's displayed in his room and takes it out when he wants to play with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

product_meta.title: LEGO Angry Birds 75823 Bird Island Egg Heist Building Kit (277 Piece)
product_meta.description:
Red's hot temper has landed him in an Angry Bird Anger Management Class at Matilda's House-but he's even angrier when a naughty piggy steals the eggs! Catapult Red at the Piggy Trike and take the eggs from the box in the back of the trike! Play out action-packed scenes from The Angry Birds Movie and return the eggs to the flock.

BRAND STORY
By LEGO
feature_bullets: Bird Island Egg Heist features Matilda's House with a staircase catapult and easel, plus a branch, plants, flower elements and a Piggy Trike
Includes 3 figures: Red, Matilda and Biker Pig
Matilda's House measures over 5" (15cm) high, 6" (17cm) wide and 3" (9cm) deep
Accessory elements include spinning Billy the Sign, 4 eggs and 2 bird nests
Piggy Trike features a giant front wheel, 2 balloons and a box at the rear for eggs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
